record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Scanned copy in ok condition. Some of the copies are ragged along the edges and one copy has lots of emulsification on the surface. Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Public Relations Office; stamp of photographer; University of Chicago Bookstore.
